remark.ch: 開學第一週請至E250上課,其餘上課教室將於第一週上課時公佈

goal.en: To give hands on training on the measurements related to Civil Engineering.
goal.ch: 藉由實驗操作瞭解工程量測之理論基礎

content.en:
Fluid Mechanics Laboratory:
Laboratory 1 Hydrostatic Pressure (Center of Pressure)
Laboratory 2 Stability of Floating Body
Laboratory 3 Jet Trajectory
Laboratory 4 Weir Flow
Laboratory 5 Jet Momentum
Laboratory 6 Bernoulli‘s Equation
Laboratory 7 Reynolds‘ Experiment (Pipe Flow)
Laboratory 8 Flow (Streamlines) Visualization
content.ch:
期中考以前：流力實驗
期中考以後：材料實驗

textbook.ch: 工程材料實驗(自編教材)

grading.ch: "出席及上課表現10% 預報、結報65% 期末作業25%"

en.competency: The Ability of Using Math, Science, and Engineering Knowledge
The Ability of Implementing Practical Engineering
The Ability of Designing, Conducting, and Analyzing Experiments
The Ability in Design and Supervision of Civil Engineering Projects
The Ability of Projet Management, Interpersonal Communication, Technical Experssiveness and Writing
The Ability of Teamwork and Integration
The Ability of Finding, Analzing, and Solving Problems Actively
The Ability of Absorbing New Information, International Perspective and Self-Learning
Interaction Between Technology and the Environment/Ecology
Engineering Ethics and Taking Social Responsibility, Having Humanity Disposition and the Spirit to Serve the Public

ch.competency: 運用數學、科學及工程知識之能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 實作/實驗
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 設計、執行實驗及分析之能力
ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 土木工程設計及監造之能力
計畫管理、人際溝通，專業表達與撰寫之能力
團隊合作與整合之能力
主動發掘、分析及解決問題之能力
國際觀、吸收新知以及自我學習之能力
ch.Assessments: 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 工程技術與生態環境之互動
ch.Assessments: 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現

ch.competency: 工程倫理並善盡社會責任，並具有人文素養及服務人群之精神
ch.Assessments: 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現
